content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Learn how to create a "button group" with CSS. Horizontal Button Groups Group a series of buttons together on a single line in a button group: Apple Samsung Sony Apple Samsung Sony How To Create a Button Group Step 1) Add HTML: Example
Step 2) Add CSS: Example .btn-group button { background-color: #04AA6D; /* Green background */ border: 1px solid green; /* Green border */ color: white; /* White text */ padding: 10px 24px; /* Some padding */ cursor: pointer; /* Pointer/hand icon */ float: left; /* Float the buttons side by side */ } .btn-group button:not(:last-child) { border-right: none; /* Prevent double borders */ } /* Clear floats (clearfix hack) */ .btn-group:after { content: ""; clear: both; display: table; } /* Add a background color on hover */ .btn-group button:hover { background-color: #3e8e41; } Justified / Full-width Button Group: Example
Tip: Go to our CSS Buttons Tutorial to learn more about how to style buttons. ★ +1
